Reviews.Title: Great DVR for the price
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: After having a DVR suffer water damage due to a water leak I needed a replacement. This unit is by far the best for the price your going to find. The menus are pretty clearly laid out, the unit is very responsive, the web browser interface is very good.  I'm very happy with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 Channel H.264 Pentaplex DVR, 480FPS FULL D1 Realtime Recording Realtime Display, 1280*1024 VGA Output, 16 CH Playback, CMS, 8xSATA HDD, Mobile Phone Surveillance.
Support Central Management System (CMS), Support External HDD for Backup
Support FULL D1 Realtime Recording
Provides Playback, Live Display, Back-up and Network Function While in Recording Mode.
Support Remote View via 3G Phone Network(Windows Mobile, Symbian, Blackberry and iPhone)
ProductInfo.Name: DSC-LTD2516FD Enterprise Level 16 Channel H.264 Pentaplex DVR, 480FPS FULL D1 Realtime Recording Realtime Display with 1TB HDD (DVD Burner is NOT INCLUDED)
